de.fu.scetris.scheduler.manager
Class SchedulerManager

java.lang.Object
  de.fu.scetris.scheduler.manager.SchedulerManager

public class SchedulerManager
extends Object

Scheduler Manager provides methods to control the scheduler and to get information about its state.

Scheduler Manager implements a Singleton, therefore only one Scheduler Manager can exist at a time. Scheduler Manager has essentially two states: (1) ready for a new scheduling job, (2) running a current scheduling job or (3) stopping a current scheduling job.

Further methods are provided to check the score of specified Program objects.

freezeProgram

public void freezeProgram(Program program)
                   throws DatabaseException
Freezes an arbitrary Program.

Sets the Program attribute freezed to true.

Parameters:
program - The program to freeze.
Throws:
DatabaseException - If an underlying exception regarding the database connection is thrown.

getCurrentProgramBeScheduling

public Program getCurrentProgramBeScheduling()
Returns:
If there is a current Program being scheduled it is returned, otherwise null is returned.

getCurrentSchedulingScore

public ScheduleScore getCurrentSchedulingScore()
                                        throws DatabaseException
Returns:
If there is a current Program being scheduled its ScheduleScore is returned, otherwise null is returned.
Throws:
DatabaseException - If an underlying exception regarding the database connection is thrown.

getInstance

public static SchedulerManager getInstance(RelationManager relationManager)
Lazy instantiation of the Singleton object. When this method is called the first time instance is set with the instance of SchedulerManager.

Parameters:
relationManager - Managing the connection and interaction with the database.
Returns:
the only instance of this class.

getScheduleScore

public ScheduleScore getScheduleScore(Program program)
                               throws SchedulingException,
                                      DatabaseException,
                                      NotScheduleableException
Parameters:
program - The Program which ScheduleScore should be calculated.
Returns:
The ScheduleScore of the defined Program.
Throws:
DatabaseException - If an underlying exception regarding the database connection is thrown.
SchedulingException - If the scheduling process was interrupted due to an internal exception.
NotScheduleableException - If the Program has not proposed schedule or the resources are not sufficient for a proposed schedule.

getScheduleScoreWithChange

public ScheduleScore getScheduleScoreWithChange(Program program,
                                                ProposedScheduling proposedScheduling)
                                         throws DatabaseException,
                                                SchedulingException,
                                                NotScheduleableException
If a ProposedScheduling is changed due to manually scheduling this method can be called in order to get the new ScheduleScore.

Parameters:
program - The Program which is manually scheduled.
proposedScheduling - The new ProposedScheduling to check with the rest of the scheduling.
Returns:
The ScheduleScore of the new proposed schedule.
Throws:
DatabaseException - If an underlying exception regarding the database connection is thrown.
SchedulingException - If the scheduling process was interrupted due to an internal exception.
NotScheduleableException - If the new Program has not proposed schedule or the resources are not sufficient for a proposed schedule.

initializeConfiguration

public Configuration initializeConfiguration(Program program)
                                      throws DatabaseException
Initializes Configuration with respect to the given AcademicTerm and to the given Department. When a Room has no Building or the Building has no Department it is not added.

Parameters:
academicTerm - the AcademicTerm to be scheduled.
department - the Department to be scheduled.
Returns:
Throws:
DatabaseException - If an underlying exception regarding the database connection is thrown.

isReady

public boolean isReady()
The scheduler is ready when it is not stopping and not running at the moment.

Returns:
Whether the scheduler is ready.

isRunning

public boolean isRunning()
The scheduler is running when the thread is alive.

Returns:
Whether the scheduler is running.

isStopping

public boolean isStopping()
The scheduler is stopping when its master thread was interrupted.

Returns:
Whether the scheduling process is stopping.

publishProgram

public void publishProgram(Program program)
                    throws DatabaseException
Published a specified Program.

A Program must be freezed in order to be published. If the Program was freezed yet a call to freezeProgram(Program) is made and the method is calling itself again.

Parameters:
program - The Program which should be published.
Throws:
DatabaseException - If an underlying exception regarding the database connection is thrown.

startScheduler

public void startScheduler(Program program,
                           boolean resume)
                    throws DatabaseException,
                           NotScheduleableException
Starts the scheduling process.

The Configuration is initialized with respect to the given AcademicTerm and to the given Department.

If the given Configuration is scheduleable, a separate Thread executing the Scheduler is started, otherwise an error arises.

Parameters:
academicTerm - the AcademicTerm to be scheduled.
department - the Department to be scheduled.
Throws:
DatabaseException - If an underlying exception regarding the database connection is thrown.
NotScheduleableException

stopScheduler

public void stopScheduler()
The scheduled is stopped by interruptings its master thread. Interrupting the master thread tells to cancel the algorithm on the next possible step.

                     throws DatabaseException

Throws:
DatabaseException - If an underlying exception regarding the database connection is thrown.
